title: Angel Cop
synopsis: Sometime in the future, terrorism in Japan has become commonplace, and the police have become almost as brutal as criminals. A member of the Special Security Force known as Angel, is the best of the best, stopping at nothing in her fight for justice.
voices: ['Doi, Mika', 'Hironaka, Kumiko', 'Ebara, Masashi', 'Kitamura, Kouichi', 'Utsumi, Kenji', 'Saka, Osamu', 'Mizutani, Yuuko', 'Sasaki, Nozomu', 'Genda, Tesshou', 'Seki, Toshihiko']
